decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): BLJT-01001525; Drawing No 1 (Existing plans and section); Drawing No 2 (Existing elevations); Drawing No 3 Rev: A (Proposed Plans); Drawing No 4 Rev: A (Proposed section & elevation); Drawing No 5 Rev: B (Proposed section & elevation); Drawing No 6 Rev: A (Proposed fire plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwelling, unless otherwise stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).

| The hereby approved rooflight to the rear roof slope shall be a Conservation style rooflight and lie flush with the roof, in accordance with the details indicated on hereby approved Drawing No 5 Rev: B (Proposed section & elevation); and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials and design harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Rear roof extension; and installation of one roof light to rear roof slope.
